#summary The help itself!

= Help =

There is some help..here we go:

{{{
 - H E L P - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
  coesus.exe >
   --help                               Prints this help.
   -log file                            Log file [d. log.txt]
   -v [0/1]                             Verbosity [d. 1]
   -m-addr hostname                     MySQL address [d. localhost]
   -m-port port                         MySQL port [d. 3306]
   -m-user username                     MySQL username [d. root]
   -m-pass password                     MySQL password [d. 12345]
   -m-db database                       MySQL database [d. db]
   -m-table table                       MySQL table [d. members]
   -m-ucol column                       MySQL user col. [d. username]
   -m-pcol column                       MySQL pass col. [d. password]
   -m-scol column                       MySQL salt col. [d. password]
   -m-secure [0/1]                      MySQL secure [d. 0 = False]
   -adminuser admin                     Admin username [d. admin]
   -adminpass password                  Admin password [d. 13245]
   -addr                                Listening addr [d. 0.0.0.0]
   -port                                Listeting port [d. 13370]
   -maxclients                          Max clients [d. 0 = infinite]
   -plugins plguns_subdirectory         Plugins' subdir. [d. 0 = plugins]
}}}
